columns.name: name
columns.description: The fully qualified name of the directory.

columns.name: directory_id
columns.description: The directory identifier.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies the directory.

columns.name: stage
columns.description: The current stage of the directory.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The directory type.

columns.name: access_url
columns.description: The access URL for the directory, such as http://<alias>.awsapps.com.

columns.name: alias
columns.description: The alias for the directory.

columns.name: description
columns.description: The description for the directory.

columns.name: desired_number_of_domain_controllers
columns.description: The desired number of domain controllers in the directory if the directory is Microsoft AD.

columns.name: edition
columns.description: The edition associated with this directory.

columns.name: launch_time
columns.description: Specifies when the directory was created.

columns.name: radius_status
columns.description: The status of the RADIUS MFA server connection.

columns.name: share_method
columns.description: The method used when sharing a directory to determine whether the directory should be shared within your AWS organization (ORGANIZATIONS) or with any AWS account by sending a shared directory request (HANDSHAKE).

columns.name: share_notes
columns.description: A directory share request that is sent by the directory owner to the directory consumer.

columns.name: share_status
columns.description: Current directory status of the shared AWS Managed Microsoft AD directory.

columns.name: short_name
columns.description: The short name of the directory.

columns.name: size
columns.description: The directory size.

columns.name: sso_enabled
columns.description: Indicates if single sign-on is enabled for the directory. For more information, see EnableSso and DisableSso.

columns.name: stage_last_updated_date_time
columns.description: The date and time that the stage was last updated.

columns.name: stage_reason
columns.description: Additional information about the directory stage.

columns.name: connect_settings
columns.description: A DirectoryConnectSettingsDescription object that contains additional information about an AD Connector directory.

columns.name: dns_ip_addrs
columns.description: The IP addresses of the DNS servers for the directory.

columns.name: event_topics
columns.description: Amazon SNS topic names that receive status messages from the specified Directory ID.

columns.name: snapshot_limit
columns.description: Obtains the manual snapshot limits for a directory.

columns.name: owner_directory_description
columns.description: Describes the AWS Managed Microsoft AD directory in the directory owner account.

columns.name: radius_settings
columns.description: A RadiusSettings object that contains information about the RADIUS server.

columns.name: regions_info
columns.description: Lists the Regions where the directory has replicated.

columns.name: shared_directories
columns.description: Details about the shared directory in the directory owner account for which the share request in the directory consumer account has been accepted.

columns.name: vpc_settings
columns.description: A DirectoryVpcSettingsDescription object that contains additional information about a directory.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags currently associated with the Directory Service Directory.
